lines.text: Ah, Caryanne? Er, listen. I've got a marital problem.
Paul, I, er, I found something in the bathroom.

Oh, that. Yeah, I was going to talk to you about that. Um, I hid it in there, you know, I didn't want Danielle getting into a lot of chemicals and stuff. You can't hide anything in this house, can you?
It's like a fucking car accident. One minute you're cruising along. Next minute you've got no legs.
Dad's wearing a bunch of hotdogs.
Goddamn, I knew he'd come by. I knew you'd come by. I just knew it. I saw this whole place on television. On this tv I've got in my head.
Because you can't change a channel, man. Future or past.
Ten years gone with the wind. Heads I hit Malibu Beach before Christmas.
What's ten years when you're in love?
